title: CSRFGenerateToken
name: CSRFGenerateToken
description: Provides a random token and stores it in the session. You can also provide a specific key to store in the session.

arguments.name: key
arguments.description: A random token is generated for the key provided.

arguments.name: forceNew
arguments.description:
If set to true, a new token is generated every time the function is called.
			If false, in case a token exists for the key, the same key is returned.
